Favourite softwares and services

Oct 24, 2015 Tools & Services Comments 1 min read

This post simply lists all of my favourite softwares and services.

Softwares

  • Editor

    Sublime Text 2 - love it just after 5 min of usage. Now I use it for Latex and C++.

    Aquamacs - was used for Latex

  • C/C++

    Sublime + g++ for MAC. A simple setup guide is here

    Visual Studio for WINDOWS

  • LaTeX

    Latextools - together with Sublime for editing Latex

    Mactex - use basic version for MAC

    Texmaker - was a main Latex editor in WINDOWS

    IguanaTex - add-in for Powerpoint

    LaTeXiT - for Latex in Powerpoint

  • Simulation/computation

    Matlab

    Maple - great for symbolic computation. I always use this first for equation derivation.

    Processing 2.2 - for visualizing

  • Statistics

    Stata

    Rstudio

Services

  • Domain/host

    goddady and 1&1 for domain

    github pages + Jekyll - Fast way to get your blog published using simple Markdown texts. See this or this for further steps

    Google App Engine - Easy way (for me) to build a dynamic web apps

  • Git

    github - for public repository

    bitbutket - for private repository

  • Storage

    Google photos - storing photos

    Dropbox - for storing, backup, sharing files

    Github pages for published papers.

  • Misc

    Markdown editor

List-in-progress
